levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(八)

examples.english: Next year, I will start learning Chinese at school because it is interesting.
examples.chinese: 明年，我將會在學校開始學習中文，因為它很有趣。

examples.english: My new classmate is Chinese, and he can speak both English and Mandarin very well.
examples.chinese: 我的新同學是中國人，他能說非常流利的英文和中文。

examples.english: For Lunar New Year, my family always eats delicious Chinese dumplings together.
examples.chinese: 過農曆新年時，我的家人總是會一起吃美味的中國水餃。

examples.english: We will learn fractions in math class next week.
examples.chinese: 我們下週的數學課將會學習分數。

examples.english: Good math skills help us solve many real-world problems.
examples.chinese: 好的數學能力能幫助我們解決許多現實生活中的問題。

examples.english: Even though math can be challenging, it is also very fun.
examples.chinese: 即使數學可能具有挑戰性，它也同時非常有趣。

examples.english: My favorite subject is PE, especially when we play basketball outside.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的科目是體育，特別是當我們在外面打籃球的時候。

examples.english: Next Tuesday, our PE teacher will teach us how to play volleyball.
examples.chinese: 下週二，我們的體育老師將會教我們如何打排球。

examples.english: Remember to wear your comfortable PE uniform and sports shoes for class.
examples.chinese: 記得穿著你舒適的體育服和運動鞋來上課。

examples.english: The teacher will answer all our questions after class.
examples.chinese: 老師會在下課後回答我們所有的問題。

examples.english: You must find the answer to this riddle by yourself.
examples.chinese: 你必須自己找出這個謎題的答案。

examples.english: If you study hard, you will answer all the questions easily.
examples.chinese: 如果你努力學習，你就能輕鬆回答所有問題。

examples.english: Hi, I'm glad to see you again at school today.
examples.chinese: 嗨，我很高興今天在學校又見到你了。

examples.english: Hi, can you help me with this math problem later?
examples.chinese: 嗨，你等一下可以幫我解決這道數學題嗎？

examples.english: I will say hi to your teacher for you next week.
examples.chinese: 我下週會替你跟你的老師打招呼。

examples.english: He will say hello to his teacher when he sees her.
examples.chinese: 他看到老師時，會跟她說哈囉。

examples.english: My mom will always say hello when she answers the phone.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽接電話時，總是會說哈囉。

examples.english: He will shout 'Hello!' to get his friend's attention.
examples.chinese: 他會大喊「哈囉！」來引起朋友的注意。

examples.english: Good-bye, I will see you at school tomorrow!
examples.chinese: 再見，我們明天學校見！

examples.english: That was a fun party, so good-bye everyone!
examples.chinese: 那派對真好玩，所以大家再見了！

examples.english: We have to say good-bye now, but we can call each other soon.
examples.chinese: 我們現在必須說再見了，但我們可以很快互相打電話。

examples.english: My classmate will speak Japanese when he visits Japan.
examples.chinese: 我的同學去日本時會說日語。

examples.english: The teacher will speak to us about the field trip next week.
examples.chinese: 老師下週會和我們談論校外教學的事。

examples.english: Our principal will speak about healthy eating at the school assembly.
examples.chinese: 校長會在學校朝會上談論健康飲食。

examples.english: My teacher will say, "Good job," after I finish my homework.
examples.chinese: 我的老師在我完成作業後會說：「做得好。」

examples.english: My mom will say that she wants to cook dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽今晚會說她想煮晚餐。

examples.english: We will say goodbye to our friends before we leave for vacation.
examples.chinese: 我們在出發度假前會和朋友說再見。

examples.english: I will ask my teacher how to solve this math problem after class.
examples.chinese: 我下課後會問老師怎麼解這道數學題。

examples.english: She will ask her friend to borrow a storybook tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 她明天會問她的朋友借一本故事書。

examples.english: We will ask our classmates if they want to play a fun game.
examples.chinese: 我們會問同學想不想跟我們一起玩有趣的遊戲。

examples.english: My friend and I will talk about our favorite books tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我朋友和我明天會聊我們最喜歡的書。

examples.english: We will talk to our coach about the new game rules.
examples.chinese: 我們會跟我們的教練討論新的比賽規則。

examples.english: We will talk quietly in the library to not disturb others.
examples.chinese: 我們在圖書館會輕聲說話，才不會打擾到別人。

examples.english: Students will ask many questions after the teacher finishes.
examples.chinese: 老師講完後，學生們會問很多問題。

examples.english: The most important question is how we will solve this puzzle.
examples.chinese: 最重要的問題是我們將如何解開這個謎題。

examples.english: He will question if their plan is really safe.
examples.chinese: 他會質疑他們的計畫是否真的安全。

examples.english: I will draw a big house with a garden for my art homework.
examples.chinese: 我會為我的美術作業畫一個有花園的大房子。

examples.english: Please draw a straight line from this point to that one on the map.
examples.chinese: 請在地圖上從這一點到那一點畫一條直線。

examples.english: Tomorrow, my friend will draw a cute cat for my birthday card.
examples.chinese: 明天，我的朋友將會為我的生日卡片畫一隻可愛的貓。

examples.english: After we finish lunch, the table will be clean again.
examples.chinese: 我們吃完午餐後，桌子會再次變乾淨。

examples.english: Every Saturday, my family will clean the house together.
examples.chinese: 每個星期六，我的家人會一起打掃房子。

examples.english: Please make sure your hands are clean before you eat.
examples.chinese: 請確保你的手在吃飯前是乾淨的。

examples.english: Lily will wear a beautiful red dress to the concert tonight.
examples.chinese: 莉莉今晚將會穿一件漂亮的紅色洋裝去聽演唱會。

examples.english: For the sports day, all students will wear their new blue T-shirts.
examples.chinese: 運動會時，所有學生都將會穿他們新的藍色T恤。

examples.english: Tomorrow, I will wear my comfortable sneakers for our long walk.
examples.chinese: 明天，我將會穿我舒適的運動鞋去走長長的步。

examples.english: After playing basketball, I will wash my sweaty face and hands.
examples.chinese: 打完籃球後，我會洗我滿是汗水的臉和手。

examples.english: Every Saturday, my sister helps Mom wash the dirty clothes.
examples.chinese: 每週六，我姐姐會幫媽媽洗髒衣服。

examples.english: Before eating, remember to wash the apples and grapes carefully.
examples.chinese: 吃東西前，記得要仔細清洗蘋果和葡萄。

examples.english: Next week, I will meet my new English teacher for the first time.
examples.chinese: 下週，我將第一次見到我的新英文老師。

examples.english: Our book club will meet every Saturday morning at the library.
examples.chinese: 我們的讀書俱樂部將在每週六早上於圖書館見面。

examples.english: Yesterday, I was surprised to meet an old friend on the street.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我很驚訝地在街上遇見一位老朋友。

examples.english: Will you come to my birthday party next Saturday?
examples.chinese: 你下週六會來我的生日派對嗎？

examples.english: Do you want to come with us to the park?
examples.chinese: 你想和我們一起去公園嗎？

examples.english: Please come inside, it's getting cold outside.
examples.chinese: 請進來，外面越來越冷了。

examples.english: I want a new bike for my birthday next month.
examples.chinese: 我下個月生日想要一台新腳踏車。

examples.english: My sister wants to travel to Japan during summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐暑假想要去日本旅行。

examples.english: After school, I want to be a pilot and fly big planes.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我想要當飛行員並駕駛大飛機。

examples.english: My sister will help me clean my room this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我的姊姊這個週末會幫我打掃我的房間。

examples.english: Eating vegetables every day will help you grow strong and healthy.
examples.chinese: 每天吃蔬菜會幫助你長得強壯又健康。

examples.english: Many people will help to clean up the park next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 許多人下週六將會幫忙清理公園。

examples.english: We will use special colors to draw the beautiful pictures for the art class.
examples.chinese: 我們將會使用特別的顏色來畫美術課的漂亮圖畫。

examples.english: Students should learn to use their creativity to solve problems in daily life.
examples.chinese: 學生應該學習如何使用他們的創造力來解決日常生活中的問題。

examples.english: Please don't use too much paper when you are drawing so we can save trees.
examples.chinese: 請你畫畫的時候不要使用太多的紙，這樣我們可以節省樹木。

examples.english: My brother will get a new bicycle for his birthday next month.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥下個月生日會得到一台新的腳踏車。

examples.english: We will meet many new friends when we start junior high school.
examples.chinese: 當我們開始上國中時，我們會認識很多新朋友。

examples.english: The teacher will teach us a new way to solve this math problem.
examples.chinese: 老師將會教我們一個解決這個數學問題的新方法。

examples.english: My old neighbor often shares interesting stories from his childhood.
examples.chinese: $我年邁的鄰居常常分享他童年時的趣事。

examples.english: This old temple has stood here for over two hundred years.
examples.chinese: $這座古老的寺廟已經在這裡佇立超過兩百年了。

examples.english: Next month, our class pet, a turtle, will be five years old.
examples.chinese: $下個月，我們班的烏龜寵物就會五歲了。

examples.english: The fast train will take us to the city quickly tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 這輛快速列車明天早上會很快載我們去市區。

examples.english: If you practice hard, you will learn new English words fast.
examples.chinese: 如果你努力練習，你會很快學會新的英文字。

examples.english: Our class will make fast progress in math this semester.
examples.chinese: 我們班這學期數學會進步很快。

examples.english: A snail is a very slow animal, but it can still reach its goal.
examples.chinese: 蝸牛是一種很慢的動物，但牠仍然可以達到目標。

examples.english: The internet connection at school is sometimes very slow.
examples.chinese: 學校的網路連線有時候很慢。

examples.english: My old watch is always a little slow, so I often miss my bus.
examples.chinese: 我的舊手錶總是慢了一點，所以我常常錯過公車。

examples.english: We will see many beautiful flowers in the garden next spring.
examples.chinese: 我們明年春天將會在花園裡看到許多美麗的花朵。

examples.english: Lisa is going to wear a beautiful new dress for the party.
examples.chinese: 麗莎將會穿一件美麗的新洋裝去參加派對。

examples.english: It was a beautiful day, perfect for a picnic by the lake.
examples.chinese: 那是一個美好的一天，很適合在湖邊野餐。

examples.english: That new boy will look very handsome in his school uniform.
examples.chinese: 那個新來的男孩穿上校服會看起來很英俊。

examples.english: My brother has a handsome smile that always makes people happy.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥有一個帥氣的笑容，總是能讓大家開心。

examples.english: The famous singer is handsome, and many fans love him.
examples.chinese: 那位有名的歌手很英俊，許多粉絲都喜歡他。

examples.english: My brother is very smart; he always knows the answers.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥很聰明；他總是知道答案。

examples.english: It was smart of her to save money for a new bicycle.
examples.chinese: 她存錢買新腳踏車是很聰明的做法。

examples.english: Our team will need some smart ideas to win the competition.
examples.chinese: 我們的團隊將需要一些聰明的點子來贏得比賽。

examples.english: We will have a fine picnic if the weather stays good.
examples.chinese: 如果天氣持續很好，我們將會有一次美好的野餐。

examples.english: This painting has many fine details that make it beautiful.
examples.chinese: 這幅畫有許多美好的細節，讓它很美麗。

examples.english: They are looking forward to a fine day at the beach tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 他們期待明天在海灘度過美好的一天。

examples.english: We had so much fun playing games together at the party.
examples.chinese: 我們在派對上一起玩遊戲玩得很開心。

examples.english: This new board game is really fun for everyone in our class.
examples.chinese: 這個新的桌遊對我們班上的每個人來說都非常有趣。

examples.english: I hope we will have a lot of fun on our school trip next month.
examples.chinese: 我希望我們下個月的學校旅行會玩得很開心。

examples.english: We will have a great time playing games tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們明天一起玩遊戲會很棒。

examples.english: My teacher said I did a great job on the science project.
examples.chinese: 老師說我在科學專案上做得很好。

examples.english: This will be a great chance for us to learn new things.
examples.chinese: 這會是個很棒的機會讓我們學習新事物。

examples.english: This book is boring, so I will read another one.
examples.chinese: 這本書很乏味，所以我會去讀另一本。

examples.english: Waiting in line for a long time can be quite boring.
examples.chinese: 排隊等候很長一段時間會感到很乏味。

examples.english: History lessons are boring to some students, but I like them.
examples.chinese: 歷史課對有些學生來說很乏味，但我喜歡。

examples.english: My mom will buy some fresh fruit at the market later.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽待會兒會在市場買一些新鮮水果。

examples.english: Would you like some hot tea to warm you up?
examples.chinese: 你想喝點熱茶來暖暖身子嗎？

examples.english: Some day, I will travel to another country with my family.
examples.chinese: 有一天，我會和我的家人一起到另一個國家旅行。

examples.english: She will be very happy to get this gift tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 她明天收到這份禮物會非常開心。

examples.english: Learning a new language can be very interesting and fun.
examples.chinese: 學習一種新語言可以非常有趣且好玩。

examples.english: They always sing very beautifully at the school concert.
examples.chinese: 他們總是在學校音樂會上唱得非常優美。

examples.english: My friend will come to my party, and I hope you will come too.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友會來我的派對，我希望你也會來。

examples.english: The homework is too difficult for me to finish quickly.
examples.chinese: 這份功課對我來說太難了，無法很快完成。

examples.english: You should not eat too much candy before dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 今晚晚餐前你不應該吃太多糖果。

examples.english: We will buy a new house with a big yard next summer.
examples.chinese: 我們明年夏天會買一棟有大院子的新房子。

examples.english: My little brother wants a big dog house for his new puppy.
examples.chinese: 我小弟想要一個大狗屋給他的新小狗。

examples.english: Living in a house gives you more space than an apartment.
examples.chinese: 住房子比住公寓給你更多空間。

examples.english: There is a comfortable sofa in our living room for family time.
examples.chinese: 我們家的客廳有一張舒服的沙發，可以讓家人一起度過時光。

examples.english: My little brother likes to play with his toy cars in the living room.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟喜歡在客廳玩他的玩具車。

examples.english: Next Sunday, we will clean the living room and decorate it for Christmas.
examples.chinese: 下週日，我們會打掃客廳並佈置它來迎接聖誕節。

examples.english: My mom often bakes delicious cookies in our big kitchen.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽經常在我們大廚房裡烤好吃的餅乾。

examples.english: We will eat breakfast together in the kitchen tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 我們明天早上將在廚房裡一起吃早餐。

examples.english: You can find forks and spoons in the kitchen drawer.
examples.chinese: 你可以在廚房抽屜裡找到叉子和湯匙。

examples.english: My bedroom has a big window facing the garden.
examples.chinese: 我的寢室有一扇面向花園的大窗戶。

examples.english: I will tidy up my bedroom tomorrow morning.
examples.chinese: 我明天早上會整理我的寢室。

examples.english: There will be two bedrooms upstairs in our new apartment.
examples.chinese: 我們的新公寓樓上會有兩間寢室。

examples.english: After playing, I will take a shower in the clean bathroom.
examples.chinese: 玩完之後，我會到乾淨的浴室洗澡。

examples.english: The new restaurant will have a beautiful bathroom for customers.
examples.chinese: 這家新餐廳將會有一間漂亮的浴室供顧客使用。

examples.english: Our hotel room will have a big bathroom with a bathtub.
examples.chinese: 我們的飯店房間將會有一間帶浴缸的大浴室。

examples.english: Please remember to close the door quietly when you leave the room.
請記得離開房間時要輕輕地關上門。
Tomorrow, we will meet right in front of the classroom door after school.
明天放學後，我們會在教室門口前面見面。
The main door will be locked, so please knock before you enter.
大門會鎖起來，所以請在進去前先敲門。
Our home is where we always feel warm and safe.
examples.chinese: 我們的家是我們總感到溫暖又安全的地方。

examples.english: After school, I will go home directly to finish my homework.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我會直接回家完成我的功課。

examples.english: No matter where I travel, my true home will always be Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 無論我到哪裡旅行，我真正的家永遠都會是台灣。

examples.english: After school, I will go to my room to finish my homework.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我會去我的房間完成功課。

examples.english: The box is full; there is no room for more toys inside.
examples.chinese: 這個盒子滿了；裡面沒有空間放更多玩具了。

examples.english: Next year, my brother and I will have separate rooms at the dormitory.
examples.chinese: 明年，我哥哥和我將在宿舍擁有各自的房間。

examples.english: The little boy will draw a picture on the wall.
examples.chinese: 小男孩將在牆壁上畫一幅畫。

examples.english: They will build a strong wall around the garden next month.
examples.chinese: 他們下個月將會在花園周圍蓋一道堅固的牆壁。

examples.english: The old castle has a very high wall for protection.
examples.chinese: 這座舊城堡有一道很高大的牆壁來做防護。

examples.english: Tomorrow, I will buy a new bed for my room.
examples.chinese: 明天我會為我的房間買一張新床。

examples.english: It's time for me to go to bed now.
examples.chinese: 我現在該上床睡覺了。

examples.english: Please make your bed before you leave for school.
examples.chinese: 請你在出門上學前整理好你的床。

examples.english: My little brother will get a new toy robot for Christmas.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟聖誕節會得到一個新的玩具機器人。

examples.english: Please put all your toys back in the box after playing.
examples.chinese: 玩完之後，請把你所有的玩具放回盒子裡。

examples.english: Tomorrow, we will visit the big toy store to choose a special gift.
examples.chinese: 明天，我們會去那間大玩具店挑選一份特別的禮物。

examples.english: We will open the window to let fresh air in tomorrow.我們明天會打開窗戶讓新鮮空氣進來。
The big window in the living room lets in a lot of sunlight.客廳裡的大窗戶讓很多陽光照進來。
My little brother likes to look out the window at passing cars.我的小弟弟喜歡看著窗外經過的車子。
We will buy a new smart TV next month for our living room.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月將會為客廳買一台新的智慧電視。

examples.english: After finishing my homework, I usually watch TV for an hour.
examples.chinese: 做完功課後，我通常會看一小時的電視。

examples.english: What interesting TV shows will be on this weekend?
examples.chinese: 這個週末會有什麼有趣的電視節目呢？

examples.english: We will buy a smart television next month.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月會買一台智慧型電視。

examples.english: Watching too much television is not good for your eyes.
examples.chinese: 看太多電視對你的眼睛不好。

examples.english: This evening, our family will watch a movie on television together.
examples.chinese: 今晚，我們一家人會一起在電視上看電影。

examples.english: My dad will buy a new telephone for his office next month.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸下個月會為他的辦公室買一支新電話。

examples.english: I will use the telephone to talk with my friend tonight.
examples.chinese: 我今晚會用電話和我的朋友講話。

examples.english: Please telephone me when you arrive at the park tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 明天你到達公園時，請打電話給我。

examples.english: When it's hot, we will turn on the fan.
examples.chinese: 當天氣熱的時候，我們會打開電風扇。

examples.english: This big fan will make our classroom cooler.
examples.chinese: 這台大電風扇會讓我們的教室更涼快。

examples.english: Mom will buy a new fan for the kitchen soon.
examples.chinese: 媽媽很快會為廚房買一台新電風扇。

examples.english: My cat loves to sleep on the soft sofa every afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我的貓每天下午都喜歡睡在軟軟的沙發上。

examples.english: We will relax on the sofa after dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚吃完飯後會在沙發上休息。

examples.english: This small sofa can turn into a bed for guests.
examples.chinese: 這個小沙發可以變成一張床給客人睡。

examples.english: Remember to put your bicycle key in your bag.
examples.chinese: 記得把你的腳踏車鑰匙放進包包裡。

examples.english: We need the spare key to open the front door.
examples.chinese: 我們需要備用鑰匙來打開大門。

examples.english: Tomorrow, I will give you the key to my diary.
examples.chinese: 明天，我會把我的日記本鑰匙給你。

examples.english: After eating, please put your dirty dish into the kitchen sink.
examples.chinese: $吃完飯後，請把你的髒盤子放進廚房水槽裡。

examples.english: Tomorrow, we will help Dad wash all the dishes after lunch.
examples.chinese: $明天，我們將會在午餐後幫爸爸洗所有的盤子。

examples.english: All the clean dishes are now ready to be put back in the cabinet.
examples.chinese: $所有乾淨的盤子現在都準備好放回櫃子裡了。

examples.english: I will eat my cereal from this colorful bowl every morning.
examples.chinese: 我每天早上都會用這個彩色碗吃我的麥片。

examples.english: My mom always prepares a big bowl of fresh fruit for us.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽總是會幫我們準備一大碗新鮮水果。

examples.english: Please put all the cooked rice into this clean serving bowl.
examples.chinese: 請把所有煮好的飯放進這個乾淨的飯碗裡。

examples.english: We will use chopsticks to eat our delicious noodles tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們明天會用筷子吃我們美味的麵。

examples.english: I will buy a new pair of chopsticks for dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我今晚會買一副新筷子吃晚餐。

examples.english: My mom will teach me how to use chopsticks next week.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽下週會教我怎麼使用筷子。

examples.english: My favorite ceramic cup has a cute cat design on it.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的陶瓷杯上有一個可愛的貓咪圖案。

examples.english: For the cake recipe, you will need two cups of flour.
examples.chinese: 做這個蛋糕食譜，你需要兩杯麵粉。

examples.english: After playing outside, I will get a cold cup of water.
examples.chinese: 玩完外面後，我會去拿一杯冰水。

examples.english: Please give me a glass of orange juice.
examples.chinese: 請給我一杯柳橙汁。

examples.english: Be careful, the glass will break easily if you drop it.
examples.chinese: 小心，如果你把它掉下去，這個玻璃杯會很容易破。

examples.english: I always use a clean glass for my morning milk.
examples.chinese: 我早上喝牛奶總是會用一個乾淨的玻璃杯。

examples.english: We will go to the zoo to see the pandas this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我們這週末會去動物園看貓熊。

examples.english: You can learn about many different animals when you visit a zoo.
examples.chinese: 當你參觀動物園時，你可以學到許多不同的動物知識。

examples.english: My favorite part of the zoo is watching the monkeys swing from trees.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡動物園的部分是看猴子在樹上盪來盪去。

examples.english: Tomorrow, my family will visit the new park to have a picnic.
examples.chinese: 明天，我的家人將去新的公園野餐。

examples.english: My dad will park the car, then we will walk to the entrance.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸會把車停好，然後我們就會走到入口。

examples.english: If it's sunny, we will definitely play frisbee at the big park.
examples.chinese: 如果天氣晴朗，我們一定會在大公園玩飛盤。

examples.english: Next summer, we will visit a large farm with many different animals.
examples.chinese: 明年夏天，我們將參觀一個有許多不同動物的大農場。

examples.english: My grandpa used to farm this land, growing delicious vegetables for us.
examples.chinese: 我的爺爺以前在這片土地上耕種，為我們種植美味的蔬菜。

examples.english: Living on a farm means you will wake up early to feed the animals.
examples.chinese: 住在農場上意味著你將會早起餵動物。

examples.english: We will go to the new store to buy snacks this afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們今天下午會去那間新店買零食。

examples.english: The convenience store near my house opens very early every day.
examples.chinese: 我家附近那間便利商店每天很早就開門了。

examples.english: My mom wants to visit the stationery store because she needs new pens.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽想去文具店，因為她需要新原子筆。

examples.english: I will go to the bookstore to buy a new comic book tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天將會去書店買一本新的漫畫書。

examples.english: My friend and I will meet at the big bookstore downtown next Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我和朋友下週六將在市區那間大書店碰面。

examples.english: You can find many interesting storybooks at this bookstore later.
examples.chinese: 你之後可以在這間書店找到許多有趣的繪本。

examples.english: My brother will go to the hospital because he has a high fever.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥會去醫院，因為他發高燒了。

examples.english: Doctors and nurses work at the hospital to help sick people get better.
examples.chinese: 醫生和護士在醫院工作，幫助病人康復。

examples.english: My friend is staying in the hospital, so I will visit him tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友住在醫院裡，所以我明天會去看他。

examples.english: My mom will go to the bank to deposit some money tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽明天會去銀行存一些錢。

examples.english: We will put our savings in this new bank.
examples.chinese: 我們會把存款放在這家新銀行。

examples.english: This bank has many ATMs for customers to use.
examples.chinese: 這家銀行有很多提款機給顧客使用。

examples.english: We often go to the public library to read new books and magazines.
examples.chinese: 我們常常去公共圖書館看新書和雜誌。

examples.english: I will borrow a fantastic storybook from the school library next week.
examples.chinese: 我下週會從學校圖書館借一本很棒的故事書。

examples.english: This modern library has a quiet study area and free internet access.
examples.chinese: 這間現代化的圖書館有安靜的閱讀區和免費網路。

examples.english: Tomorrow, we will go to the supermarket to buy some fresh fruits.
examples.chinese: 明天，我們會去超級市場買一些新鮮水果。

examples.english: Next week, I will look for my new school supplies at the big supermarket.
examples.chinese: 下週，我會去那間大超級市場找我的新文具。

examples.english: My mom will take me to the supermarket because it is very convenient.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽會帶我去超級市場，因為它非常方便。

examples.english: We will visit many beautiful places in Taiwan next summer.
examples.chinese: 我們明年夏天將會參觀台灣許多美麗的地方。

examples.english: Many tourists will try special food from Taiwan next year.
examples.chinese: 明年將會有許多觀光客品嚐來自台灣的特色美食。

examples.english: Taiwan will continue to help other countries with technology.
examples.chinese: 台灣將會持續用科技幫助其他國家。

examples.english: My family will travel to America for our summer vacation.
我的家人暑假會去美國旅行。
Students in Taiwan enjoy many cartoons from America.
台灣的學生喜歡很多來自美國的卡通。
Some people dream of studying in America in the future.
有些人夢想未來去美國讀書。
We can see many colorful flowers blooming in the park next month.我們下個月可以在公園裡看到許多五顏六色的花朵綻放。
She was the flower of her family, always bringing joy to everyone.她是家裡最珍貴的花朵，總是帶給每個人歡樂。
His artistic talent will really flower when he goes to art school.當他去讀美術學校時，他的藝術天賦將會真正綻放。
Next spring, a small bird will build its nest on this tall tree.
examples.chinese: 明年春天，一隻小鳥會在這棵高大的樹上築巢。

examples.english: Our family will plant a new apple tree in the garden next weekend.
examples.chinese: 我們家下週末將會在花園裡種一棵新的蘋果樹。

examples.english: My grandma will show me our family tree during Chinese New Year.
examples.chinese: 農曆新年時，我的奶奶將會給我看我們的家族樹。

examples.english: We will take a school trip to Kenting next month.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月將會去墾丁進行一次學校旅行。

examples.english: Our family trip to Japan last year was super fun.
examples.chinese: 我們去年去日本的家庭旅行非常有趣。

examples.english: I hope to plan a wonderful trip with my friends this summer.
examples.chinese: 我希望今年夏天能和朋友們計畫一趟美好的旅行。

examples.english: My dream is to travel the world and see many exciting places.
examples.chinese: 我的夢想是環遊世界，看看許多令人興奮的地方。

examples.english: Last night, I had a very funny dream about flying with my friends.
examples.chinese: 昨晚，我做了一個關於和朋友一起飛翔的有趣夢。

examples.english: We will always dream big and work hard to achieve our future goals.
examples.chinese: 我們會一直抱持遠大夢想並努力實現我們未來的目標。

examples.english: We will take the MRT to Taipei 101 next week.
examples.chinese: 我們下週會搭捷運去台北101。

examples.english: The nearest MRT station is only five minutes away from here.
examples.chinese: 最近的捷運站離這裡只有五分鐘。

examples.english: Riding the MRT is very fast and convenient for city travel.
examples.chinese: 搭捷運對城市裡的交通來說又快又方便。

examples.english: My brother collected exactly one hundred stamps last year.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥去年收集了正好一百張郵票。

examples.english: Hundreds of colorful fish swim in the ocean near our island.
examples.chinese: 數百隻色彩鮮豔的魚在我們島嶼附近的海裡游泳。

examples.english: The new library will be one hundred meters away from school.
examples.chinese: 新的圖書館將會離學校一百公尺遠。

examples.english: I will need five dollars to buy this delicious snack tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會需要五元來買這個美味的點心。

examples.english: My friend only has one dollar left in his wallet today.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友今天錢包裡只剩下一元了。

examples.english: He wants to earn more dollars to save for a new bike.
examples.chinese: 他想賺更多元來存錢買新腳踏車。
